title: [Large-Scale] Microlearning Based on an Integrated Instructional and Motivational Design Model for Physicians' Continuing Education

context.additional_context: Short-term intensive course conducted in a smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environment. Strengthening both theoretical and practical competencies through clinical case-based learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain the etiology, diagnosis, and clinical management procedures of acute respiratory failure with 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze virtual patient cases provided in a mobile environment and develop appropriate treatment plans.
Learners can achieve a motivation level of 75 points or higher in post-learning motivation surveys.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
